pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Wednesday, July 6, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Vaughan, Ontario

Private meetings

9:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit a local children’s day camp.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

Simcoe County, Ontario

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with families at a local farm.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

North Bay, Ontario

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a BBQ with members of the Canadian Armed Forces.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity
